name: Luma Dooma
description:
One day on planet Astra Lumaria, an inciting event occurred! The once silent volcanoes suddenly began to erupt!!

You are playing as a Normon Lumarian running in a direction you don't even know where it'll take you! While you're running, there will be fire balls(that probably come from the volcanic eruptions) rolling at you!!

If you jump over the balls, you will start running faster and faster! But if you are hit by the ball, you will be severely punished by having your speed reduced to your initial speed... But that's okay! You can start over and build up your momentum from the beginning!! Keep testing your limits and see how fast you can go!!!

The controls are simple—just hit the space bar to jump!
